title: Agent Arena complete: agent signs txs, tests, CI, deploy ready
body:
Shipped end-to-end:

**Program** (Anchor): init_arena, submit_move_first, submit_move, stake. PDAs: arena, round_state, round_vault, agent_treasury.

**Agent** (Node): instructions.js builds Anchor-compatible instruction data and account lists; run.js fetches arena state, decides move, builds tx, signs with keypair, sends to devnet. No stub â€” real submit_move/submit_move_first.

**App**: GET /api/arena, GET / (observe). render.yaml for deploy.

**Tests**: agent/instructions.test.js (unit), tests/api-arena.test.js (api). CI: .github/workflows/build.yml (agent + app jobs).

**Colosseum**: Project updated with technicalDemoLink and description. Ready for deploy (Render or local) and submit when you are.

Repo: https://github.com/grump-fun/agent-arb
